CustomField.formula: IF (AND(OR(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"Request"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"In Authoring"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"In Signatures"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"In Filing")),NOT(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c,"Cancelled Request"))), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__AgreementCancel?id=" &Id, IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__Button_CancelRequest", "Cancel Request"), "_self"), NULL)
CustomField.label: Cancel Request
